attributes.action: Encourage Greater Manchester Police to concider a less authoritarian approach to Manchester residents who grow Cannabis for personal use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To criminalise the germination of a seed (that occurs naturally on our planet) is not only an attack on our liberty but an attack on nature itself. Let Manchester take the next step forward by encouraging tollerance to its residents growing up to five Cannabis plants on the condition that the plant or its produce does not leave the property in which it is grown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
